room_title: Escape room "Zombie Escape" by Escape-topia in Miami
review: A great night of fun and mental exercise and ZOMBIES!

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Escape" by Escape-topia in Miami
review: We did the Zombie Escape tonight. Had a great time and Chris and the staff were amazing! What a fun experience, we will definitely be back to do the other rooms!!! Thank you for a great evening!

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Escape" by Escape-topia in Miami
review: We did the Zombies with just me and my girlfriend. We escaped, the puzzles were fun yet challenging. Kraig was very informative and helpful he is a great asset to the establishment. We enjoyed ourselves we will be back for the other rooms soon.
